npc_output: I was thinking of baking some fresh bread, would you like to help me? |r3|
I was thinking of playing a prank on the king, want to join me? |r1|
Actually, I need someone to help me heal the holy faith during ceremony, will you assist me? |r1|
Not much, just preparing for the ceremony, I need to conduct the holy prayer during ceremony, care to join me? |r3|
I'd love to, but first I need to cast the salty fish during fishing, want to help? |r1|
Just navigating the adventurous ship after docking, it's a lot of work, but someone's gotta do it |r2|
Actually, I could use someone to help me deliver the humble cleaning before dinner, would you be so kind? |r1|
I love singing the colorful performance during festival, it's always a crowd pleaser, want to hear me sing? |r1|
I was thinking of catching the early catch before storm, want to join me? |r1|
I was thinking of stealing the shadowy loot in the alley, but it's not safe, maybe some other time |r1|
